text: This season ’ s trends have shown us that the ‘ 90s are back in more mores than one. From cargo pants to cat - eye sunglasses and even combat boots. You can ’ t scroll through Instagram or walk down the street without spotting at least one of these throwback styles. This fall, we ’ re going old school – literally! Since we ’ re already embracing all of the fab ‘ 90 - inspired trends the decade has to offer, we might as well go all or nothing and bring back “ Clueless ”. In true Cher Horowitz fashion, plenty of designers are bringing back the signature yellow plaid blazer and pleated schoolgirl skirt duo that she wore to rule the school.
